0101011010011100 0001111010001000 1 -> sum: 0111010100100101, cout: 0
0010101101111010 0000110001011100 0 -> sum: 0011011111010110, cout: 0
0011011101100000 0100110000111111 0 -> sum: 1000001110011111, cout: 0
1110101101011010 0101011100001101 1 -> sum: 0100001001101000, cout: 1
0111000001001011 0101110101000100 1 -> sum: 1100110110010000, cout: 0
1110000011010111 0111000000110100 1 -> sum: 0101000100001100, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
